Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CloudTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CloudTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CloudTile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represent the cloud tile, shared by every player. It contains an attribute that represent the sets of students and the maximum size of this set
Author:
Dario d'Abate

  • Constructor Details

    • CloudTile

      public CloudTile(GameConstants gameConstants)
      Constructor of the class. It can handle games for 2 or 3 players
      Parameters:
      gameConstants - is the object with all the constants in the game
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if it is passed a number of player that's neither 2 nor 3

  • Method Details

    • numStudOn

      public int numStudOn()
      Getter method for the number of students on this tile
      Returns:
      Total number of students on the tile

    • numStudOn

      public int numStudOn(Color color)
      Getter method for the number of students of a specified color on a tile
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the students on the tile
      Returns:
      Number of students of a determined color on the tile

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Indicates if a tile has no students on it
      Returns:
      True if a tile does not contain a student, false otherwise

    • isFillable

      public boolean isFillable()
      This method is invoked as a helper when filling a cloud tile. It indicates that the cloud tile can be filled with another student
      Returns:
      True if the tile can be filled with one more student, false otherwise

    • fill

      public void fill(Color color)
      This method put a single student on a tile as long as the cloud can contain it
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the student that is added on the tile

    • getTile

      public StudentsHandler getTile()
      Getter method for the sets of students on a tile, thus it removes them from a tile. Students are obtainable from a tile iff the tile is full, otherwise the sets of students is unchanged
      Returns:
      Sets of students on a tile
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when a tile is not full of students
